nodes.text: By the year 5 BBY, an RA-7 protocol droid was owned by Jenkes, a lieutenant in the Imperial Security Bureau. Working as his receptionist, it was destroyed by the lieutenant when it accidentally stumbled upon his criminal activities.

By the year 5 BBY, this RA-7 protocol droid worked at the planet Lothal's Imperial Security Bureau headquarters in Capital City, where it served as ISB Lieutenant Jenkes' receptionist. When the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk arrived on Lothal pursuing a bounty on Gronson Takkaro, a Dug business partner of Jenkes', the lieutenant had his RA-7 keep him updated on the hunters activities.
A black RA-7 protocol droid, it stood 1.7 meters in height and was equipped with broadband photoreceptors featuring an antiglare coating, as well as an interface connection port.
